title: To an Inconstant One - speaker refers to one who

content.prompt: In line 5, the speaker refers to one who

choices.label: falls in and out of love repeatedly
tends to love those who are rejected by others
continues to love someone who no longer loves him

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
